sys_ui_message.key: for those wishing to return to absa, you will be required to perform a self screening survey. you can follow the steps [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yoazzvbrurfwwnv7srab6saijcr0y3nx/edit) to complete the self-screening procedure.
